mapper.select: select count(*) from member_tbl
select count(*) from order_tbl
select count(*) from board_tbl
select sum(product_price) from product_tbl pt join order_tbl ot on (pt.product_no = ot.product_no) where ot.order_status = 4

select rownum as rnum, total_sales.* from (select distinct b1.board_no as items, (select count(*) from board_join b2 where b2.board_no=b1.board_no) * (select board_price from board_tbl b3 where b3.board_no=b1.board_no) as total_count from board_join b1 order by total_count desc) total_sales where rnum between 1 and 5
select count(*) from member_tbl where reg_date between '2023-03-20' and sysdate-1
select count(*) from order_tbl where order_date between '2023-03-20' and sysdate-1
select count(*) from board_tbl where board_start between '2023-03-20' and sysdate-1

select * from (select rownum as rnum, b.* from (select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_name as memberName, member_email as memberEmail, member_phone as memberPhone, member_addr as memberAddr, member_gender as memberGender, member_bday as memberBday, member_bank as memberBank, member_account as memberAccount, member_status as memberStatus, member_agree as memberAgree, to_char(reg_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate from member_tbl order by 1 desc)b) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from member_tbl

select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_name as memberName, member_email as memberEmail, member_phone as memberPhone, member_addr as memberAddr, member_gender as memberGender, member_bday as memberBday, member_bank as memberBank, member_account as memberAccount, member_status as memberStatus, member_agree as memberAgree, to_char(reg_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate from member_tbl
where member_name like '%'||#{memberName}||'%'
where member_id like '%'|| #{memberId}||'%'
where member_no = #{memberNo}

select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_name as memberName, member_email as memberEmail, member_phone as memberPhone, member_addr as memberAddr, member_gender as memberGender, member_bday as memberBday, member_bank as memberBank, member_account as memberAccount, member_status as memberStatus, member_agree as memberAgree from member_tbl where member_no = #{_parameter}
select sum(product_price) from product_tbl pt join order_tbl ot on (pt.product_no = ot.product_no) where ot.order_status = 4 and ot.order_date between '2023-03-20' and '2023-03-31'

select * from (select rownum as rnum, b.* from (select product_no as productNo, d_category_no as detailCategoryNo, product_name as productName, product_ea as productEa, product_price as productPrice, product_status as productStatus, product_cost as productCost, gonggu_number as gongguNumber, product_content as productContent, product_discount as productDiscount from product_tbl order by 1 desc)b) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from product_tbl
mapper.update: update product_tbl set product_status = #{productStatus} where product_no = #{productNo}
mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum as rnum, b.* from (select ot.order_no as orderNo, ot.member_No as memberNo, mt.member_id, mt.member_phone, ot.product_no as productNo, ot.pay_no as payNo, to_char(ot.order_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as orderDate, ot.order_status as orderStatus, od.order_detail_cnt as orderDetailCnt, od.order_detail_price as orderDetailPrice, od.delivery_address as deliveryAddress, dt.delivery_no, dt.delivery_status from order_tbl ot join delivery_tbl dt on (ot.product_no = dt.product_no) join member_tbl mt on (ot.member_no = mt.member_no) join order_detail od on (ot.order_no = od.order_no) order by 1 desc)b)
where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from order_tbl
select sum(bt.board_price) from board_join bj join board_tbl bt on (bj.board_no = bt.board_no)
select sum(bt.board_price) from board_join bj join board_tbl bt on (bj.board_no = bt.board_no) where bt.board_date between '2023-03-01' and '2023-03-30 and bt.board_status = 2

select * from (select rownum as rnum, b.* from (select board_no as boardNo, d_category_no as detailCategoryNo, board_writer as boardWriter, board_date as boardDate, board_start as boardStart, to_char(board_end,'yyyy-mm-dd') as boardEnd, board_status as boardStatus from board_tbl bt order by 1 desc)b) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select * from (select rownum as rnum, b.* from (select board_no as boardNo, detail_name as detailName, detail_price as detailPrice from board_option order by 1 desc)b) where boardNo = #{_parameter}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, b.* FROM (SELECT bt.board_no as boardNo, bt.board_name as boardName, bt.board_writer as boardWriter, to_char(bt.board_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as boardDate, (select count(bt.board_no) from notify_tbl nt where bt.board_no = nt.board_no) as reportCount, bt.board_status as boardStatus FROM board_tbl bt GROUP BY bt.board_no, bt.board_name, bt.board_writer, bt.board_date, bt.report_count, bt.board_status ORDER BY reportCount DESC)b) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select member_no as memberNo, notify_no as notifyNo, notify_item as notifyItem from notify_tbl where board_no = #{_parameter}
select count(*) from board_tbl
mapper.update: update member_tbl set member_status = #{memberStatus} where member_no = #{memberNo}
update member_tbl set member_Status = #{memberStatus} where member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: select detail_name as detailName, detail_price as detailPrice from board_option where board_no = #{_parameter}
select board_no as boardNo, detail_name as detailName, detail_price as detailPrice from board_option where detail_name like '%'||#{_parameter}||'%'

select bt.board_no as boardNo, bt.d_category_no as detailCategoryNo, bt.board_writer as boardWriter, to_char(bt.board_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as boardDate, to_char(bt.board_start,'yyyy-mm-dd') as boardStart, to_char(bt.board_end,'yyyy-mm-dd') as boardEnd, bt.board_status as boardStatus from board_tbl bt join board_option bo on (bt.board_no = bo.board_no) where bt.board_no = #{boardNo} and bo.detail_name like '%'||#{detailName}||'%'

SELECT mt.member_no as memberNo, mt.member_name AS memberName, mt.member_id AS memberId, SUM(pt.point_ea) AS pointEa FROM point_tbl pt JOIN member_tbl mt ON (pt.member_no = mt.member_no) WHERE pt.point_status != 3 GROUP BY mt.member_name, mt.member_id, mt.member_no

select mt.member_id as memberId, pt.point_ea as pointEa, pt.point_date as pPointDate, pt.point_status as pointStatus from member_tbl mt join point_tbl pt on (mt.member_no = pt.member_no) where pt.point_status = 3 and mt.member_no = #{_parameter}

select pc.category_no as cateogoryNo, sum(od.order_detail_cnt * od.order_detail_price * (pt.product_discount)/100) as totalSales, pt.product_cost as totalCost, mt.member_gender as gender
from order_detail od join product_tbl pt on (od.product_no = pt.product_no) join detail_category dc on (pt.d_category_no = dc.d_category_no) join product_category pc on (dc.category_no = pc.category_no) join order_tbl ot on (od.order_no = ot.order_no) join pay_tbl pt on (ot.pay_no = pt.pay_no) join member_tbl mt on(ot.member_no = mt.member_no)
where ot.order_status = 1 and pt.pay_status = 1 group by pc.category_no, pt.product_cost, mt.member_gender
